item.title: How to add audio in hugo static site using a shortcode.
item.description: This is a simple tutorial on how to add audio files in hugo static sites via shortcodes. Just follow these steps STEP 1 Create a file audio.html in layouts/shortcodes folder. STEP 2 Add following lines of code in the newly created audio.html file and save. STEP 3 Save the required audio file in /static/xxx . For the demonstrative purpose I put the sample audio file in /static/posts/shortcodes/ (That’s where I put my static files for shortcode demonstrating articles).
